name: bovi-framework
description: Educational app for understanding the four fairness modes of money

scripts.build:legacy: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:css && npm run build:assets && npm run build:html
scripts.build:css: npm run concat:css && npm run minify:css
scripts.build:assets: cp -r flows dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.concat:css: cat src/styles/variables.css src/styles/base.css src/styles/components.css src/styles/scenarios.css src/styles/kpi-dashboard.css > dist/styles.css
scripts.copy:html: cp index.html dist/ && sed -i.bak 's|  <link rel="stylesheet" href="src/styles/[^"]*">||g' dist/index.html && sed -i.bak 's|  <!-- Cache buster: 2025-08-25 -->|  <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.min.css">\n  <!-- Cache buster: 2025-08-25 -->|g' dist/index.html && sed -i.bak 's|src/scripts/app.ts|app.min.js|g' dist/index.html && rm -f dist/index.html.bak
scripts.quality: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck

author: BOVI Framework Contributors
